column5: I have narrowed it down to these 2 camps for our first canadian fishing trip. We are after smallmouth and any other bonus fish. Which do you recommend?
Both are solid camps. Biggest difference is drive to vs boat to. Camp Narrows is water access. DV
Hey Jeff,Between those two choices, go with camp narrows. You will be fishing good water and it will be more remote.Davis, Are you still working with the MNR?
